titleStmt.title: A supplement to Dr. Burnet's letters relating to his travels through Switzerland, Italy, Germany, &c. In the years 1685, and 1686. Being further remarks on Switzerland, and Italy, &c. Written by a nobleman of Italy, and communicated to the author. Which he has since thought fit to publish in vindication of some passages in the letters.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Abraham Acher, bookseller by the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
